channel.title: [HELP PLX] Drop case?
channel.description:
hi..
where can i change the drop things? now only owner can drop normally, other have to do ::clearinv (same as ::empty) but i want that character rights 0-2 if they drop, the item dissapears.
please can anyone help me! [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2010, 05:18:57 am[/size][hr]please anyone could help me!?
or just post where it is.. and how to dissapear drop?
